sf.eclipse.javacc.base
Class Option

java.lang.Object
  sf.eclipse.javacc.base.Option

public class Option
extends java.lang.Object

An option is a name + type + value + default value.

Author:
Remi Koutcherawy 2003-2010 CeCILL license http://www.cecill.info/index.en.html, Marc Mazas 2009-2010
